assetProfile.address2: 32-33 Floors, Galaxy World Intersection of Meiban Avenue and Yabao Longgang District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: E-Star Commercial Management Company Limited, an investment holding company, provides commercial property operational services to owners or tenants in respect of commercial properties in the People's Republic of China. It operates through three segments: Entrusted Management Service Model; Brand and Management Output Service Model; and Sublease Service Model. The company offers positioning, construction consultancy, and tenant sourcing services, which primarily include market positioning, business planning consultancy, design and construction consultancy, and tenant sourcing; and operational management services principally comprising formulating operation strategies, conducting marketing and promotional events, tenant and property management, and rent collection. It also provides property leasing services, such as sublease of commercial spaces in the commercial properties managed under the sublease service model to tenants; value-added services primarily consisting of management of common areas in the shopping centers, which customers could rent for a short period for pop-up shops and promotional settings, and management of advertising spaces, such as LED boards and interior and exterior facades of the shopping centers; and leases commercial spaces to tenants. The company offers commercial property operational services under the COCO Park, COCO City, COCO Garden, iCO, and Top Living brands. It serves shopping centers, and streets and commercial complexes. The company offered operation services to commercial property projects located in 25 cities. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. E-Star Commercial Management Company Limited is a subsidiary of Go Star Investment Holding Limited.
